Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Relates to authorizing local municipalities to establish tourism improvement districts
Summary: Authorizes local municipalities to establish or expand tourism improvement districts and provide services thereto.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to authorizing local municipalities to establish tourism recovery improvement districts
